Night fishing is allowed since 1996 in the marked areas (from 1 January to 31 December). The confluence of the brook Coutures the River Orne at buoys with demarcated area for water skiing (ski nautique) and speedboat zone near Mill Carel. Pont de Sainte-Croix to the weir du Plessies see the district administration notice the announcements at the lake. Fishing is allowed in motorboats, but the maximum speed is 10 km / h in the upstream area.

A spectacular setting in the heart of the Venix Nature Park. The lake is located in the center of Santeuil (about 15km from the town of Cergy Pontoise. This pond was built in the Middle Ages (1500). Creek, with a fish ladder along the pond is converted into a biological reservoir for trout. Fishing allowed for all members of the association of the Val-d'Oise and the owners of miniaturized EHGO. Possibility for day tickets.
